#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 999999
int par[MAX];
set < int > s;
set < int > st;
map < string,int> mp;
map < int,int> mp2;

#define f(x) (x?x:1)
string s1,t2;

int Find(int r)
{
    if(mp2[r]==r)
        return r;
    return mp2[r]=Find(mp2[r]);
}

void Union(int a,int b)
{
    int p=Find(a);
    int q=Find(b);
    if(p!=q)
    {
        mp2[p]=q;
    }
}


void makeset(int r)
{
    mp2[r]=r;
}

int main()
{


    int n;
    cin >> n;
    int t1=1;
    for(int i=1; i<=n; i++)
    {
        int a,b;
        cin >> s1 >> t2;
        if(!mp[s1])
        {
            mp[s1]=t1++;
            makeset(mp[s1]);
        }
        if(!mp[t2])
        {
            mp[t2]=t1++;
            makeset(mp[t2]);
        }


       if(Find( mp[s1])!=Find(mp[t2]))
       {
         cout <<  "Found by random" << endl;
          Union(mp[s1],mp[t2]);
       }
       else
         cout <<  "Found in friend list" << endl;
         // Union(mp[s1],mp[t2]);

    }

}
